lines.text: Angels dancing 'round
As I hear the sound of you
Is this you drawing near?
Oh Lord, please come take away my fear
To o - pen up again
My friend
There is no place I'd rather be
Oh Lord, than here beholding Thee
Open up my eyes so I can see
Your beauty Lord, your beauty Lord
When I am weak Lord, you are strong
Help me through the day when it is long
I run into your open arms of love
The way you move takes away my fear
The way you move lets me know you're near
The way you move satisfies my soul
The way you move, it makes me whole
The way you move touches deep inside
The way you move, I can't hi - de
From your presence
